text.*:
This is a list of football-related statues.a

Contents

  • 1 List
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes
  • 4 References

Notes[edit]

  • ^ Note a: It does not include any busts, friezes, figurines, medallions, cameos or deathmasks.
